oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The narrator’s adventure with a Leopard. In the Katkop dialect by ≠kásin (L IV.-1. 3458-3464).
Later ≠kasin's father goes to hunt springbok to feed the family, but misfires with the gun and comes home empty-handed, to be scolded by his wife.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ≠kasin's adventure with a leopard
